description: HAPI MCP server: Dynamically exposes OpenAPI REST APIs as MCP tools for AI assistants

environmentVariables.name: HAPI_FQDN
environmentVariables.description: Fully Qualified Domain Name for the HAPI server (used in MCP tool URLs)

environmentVariables.name: HAPI_HOME
environmentVariables.description: Directory path for HAPI configuration and specs. Should be mounted as a volume in Docker

environmentVariables.name: PROJECT_NAME
environmentVariables.description: The name of the project/API (alternative to positional argument)

environmentVariables.name: HAPI_OPENAPI
environmentVariables.description: OpenAPI spec URL or path (alternative to --openapi flag)

environmentVariables.name: HAPI_URL
environmentVariables.description: Backend API base URL (alternative to --url flag)

environmentVariables.name: HAPI_PORT
environmentVariables.description: Server port (alternative to --port flag) - this is the internal container port

environmentVariables.name: HAPI_CORS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated allowed CORS origins (alternative to --cors flag)

environmentVariables.name: NODE_ENV
environmentVariables.description: Node environment (development, production). 'development' enables verbose logging and debugging features.

packageArguments.name: serve
packageArguments.description: Command to start the HAPI MCP server

packageArguments.name: projectName
packageArguments.description: The name of the project/API to serve (e.g., 'petstore'). Optional when using HAPI_OPENAPI environment variable

packageArguments.name: --port
packageArguments.description: The port to listen on inside the container

packageArguments.name: --headless
packageArguments.description: Run in headless mode (serve MCP-only, no business logic)

packageArguments.name: --mcp
packageArguments.description: The server provides REST API's business logic AND also exposes them as MCP tools

packageArguments.name: --dev
packageArguments.description: Enable development mode with verbose logging

packageArguments.name: --url
packageArguments.description: The full URL for the backend API server (overrides OpenAPI spec servers). Uses OAS server URL if not provided

packageArguments.name: --openapi
packageArguments.description: OpenAPI spec file path or URL to use instead of loading from HAPI_HOME

packageArguments.name: --cors
packageArguments.description: Comma-separated list of allowed origins for CORS (e.g., 'http://localhost:3000,https://example.com')

packageArguments.name: --filename
packageArguments.description: Comma-separated list of OAS configuration files to apply (can be URLs)

packageArguments.name: --cert
packageArguments.description: Path to SSL certificate file for HTTPS. Volume mount required if using Docker. https://docs.mcp.com.ai/components/hapi-server/hapi-cli#running-with-tls-https

packageArguments.name: --key
packageArguments.description: Path to SSL key file for HTTPS. Volume mount required if using Docker
